item.description:
Hello WPC Folks,

Members Scott Erb, Dana Lane, Steve Stearns, Jeff Haynes, Nicole Chan, Cindy W, are all involved in an upcoming art show and I was hoping to spread the word. This is going to be a great evening of looking at art in a new and exciting way. I hope there are some art lovers out there that will join us on Sept 18th at 7:30PM at the Sprinkler Factory at 38 Harlow Street Worcester MA.

The show is called Things We Project. It includes the exciting and diverse work of 6 MA photographers including Worcester's own Scott Erb, who will be showcasing 10 images from his RED ROOM Series. The Show Starts at 7:30 so you could grab dinner before the show and come on by for a drink and see the art- we are planning something special for 8pm. This is a free event and open to the public so please tell your friends!

Want to know more about the artists involved please check out the web site:http://thingsweprojec...

Thank you for your time! I hope we will meet at these events!

Cheers,
Donna Dufault
Erb Photography
http://www.erbphoto.c...
http://erbphoto.wordp...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Things We Project One Night Only Gallery Show- 6 Photographers
